# SELTA Projects — llms.txt
# https://llmstxt.org

# About
SELTA Projects is a new build project management and construction coordination company
operating in Lisbon, Cascais and Setúbal, Portugal.

We manage the full process of building a new house or small residential development:
architects, contractors, permits and council liaison — from first meeting to key handover.

# Services
- Site & Land Assessment: Review of planning constraints, PDMs and build potential before commitment
- Design & Permitting Coordination: Managing architects, engineers and specialists through the licensing process at the local council (câmara municipal)
- Construction Management: Selection and management of vetted contractors, site visits, timeline and cost control
- Handover & Close: Final inspections, habitation licence (licença de utilização), full documentation delivery

# Locations
- Cascais (primary)
- Sintra
- Lisbon city
- Setúbal
- Arrábida

# Contact
Email: info@seltaprojects.com
Website: https://seltaprojects.com

# Languages
Portuguese (primary), English
